column4: foust it can be done - a guy I know got 12 gigs of ram to work with a 32 bit proc - he also has a little bit of fun with running a single box (well kind of) that can service over 20k apache sessions at the same time
i'm no expert on the subject - just pointing to an entry in wiki that talked about it.
not a problem, it can be done just not out of the "box" so to speak
